entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Clearing before morning. Risk of thunderstorms and hail early this evening. 40 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 then light late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:01 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains early in the morning. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:01 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
